name: Termination
description:
This game was created for the #ResistJam to resist oppression and raise awareness of abortion access issues.

Creative Vision:

There are many reasons a woman might need to consider having an abortion, and often people rush to persecute that decision without understanding the person's situation. This procedural narrative adventure tells the stories of 10 women faced with an unplanned pregnancy.

The game is intended to support the Tobii Eye Tracker, however a bug makes using it difficult at this time. A futurue release will address the bug to it is playable on the Tobii Eye Tracker, for now it is only playable with the mouse.
